issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add alias to sha1 and sha256 functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12621](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12621). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The names of the sha functions are **hashSHA1** and **hashSHA256**. The objective is to make the functions also being available through the **sha** and \*sha1\*names for SHA1 algorithms and **sha2** and **sha256** for SHA256 algorithms.
